name: BreakFree (itch)
description:
BreakFree

Hey there, this is a game about escaping from prison using the items that you can find or by crafting new ones. The game is still in development and it needs to improve a lot, i'm 15 and i'm still learning (oh and sorry for my bad english, i'm Italian). I'd like to hear your suggestions to help me improve this little project :)

Thank you !
